discussion.p: basic_string_view was not updated to account for other library machinery made constexpr in Oulu. Now that reverse_iterator is constexpr there's no reason the reverse range functions can't be. Also, now that we have C++14 relaxed constexpr, we can also take care of the assignment operator and copy.
split off the copy into its' own issue
P0; set what's left to Tentatively Ready
